help.title: Google translate help
help.description:
`------------------------------`
Translate a discord user's past n-message
Required: `user`, `language`
Optional: `num` (default 1)
Note: I don't translate embeds, nor my own command requests
```
%s me french 2
%s @mention german
```

error.noUser:
Please specify a user to translate their messages
```md
<command> [user] <language> [number of messages]
```
error.noAuthor: I could not find this user in this channel
error.noLanguage:
Please specify a language to translate
```md
<command> [user] <language> [number of messages]
```
error.noMessages: I could not find any messages in this channel - from this user
error.noTranslations:
No messages have been translated
Note: I don't translate embeds or my own bot commands
error.tooLong: Translated copy is too long, please try less messages
